name: Pokédex 3D Pro
overview: A follow-up to the original Pokédex 3D, Pokédex 3D Pro has all Pokémon from Generations I through V programmed in. While Meloetta and Genesect must be unlocked, all other Pokémon are available from the start. Unlike the original, this version has actual gameplay in the form of Challenge Mode, a series of quizzes. There is also some voice acting from each language's voice actor of the anime's Pokédex.
